---
title: "Doughnut Charts"
---

```{r Libs, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(chartjs)
library(magrittr)
```

## Base cutout

```{r Doughnut charts, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE}
chartjs(mtcars[1:6,], mpg, qsec) %>% 
  cjsDoughnut
```

## Custom cutout

```{r Doughnut charts custom, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE}
chartjs(mtcars[1:6,], mpg, qsec) %>% 
  cjsDoughnut(cutout = 80)
```
